archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Initiate Additional Product Offering Purchase(s)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Prepare product offering purchases in the form of product offering orders for each product offering fulfilled by another party.

properties.value: Initiate Additional Product Offering Purchase(s) prepares product offering purchase(s) in the form of product offering orders for each product offering fulfilled by one or more other parties. The order(s) is/are provided to the Initiate Product Offering Purchase process.
